Vindictus.[SURVEY] 2024 Recollection Crystal Avata:
https://nexon.link/ejv]Click here to join the Avatar Preference Survey [/url][/*][*]You can participate once per account through the Avatar Preference Survey link above.[/*][*]You can vote for up to ten avatars from the 39 available.[/*][/list][/*][/list]
 

[b][Notes][/b]
[list][*]A total of 10 avatars will be selected and released as part of the Recollection Crystal based on the survey results.[/*][*]The survey results will determine the selection of 8 female avatars and 2 male avatars.[/*][*]If a unisex avatar is chosen, it will be included either as one female or one male avatar, and further details will be provided based on the voting results.[/*][*]Please note that the 39 avatars on the survey page are sorted by their release date.[/*][*]To ensure a fair survey environment and free expression of opinions, no intermediate results will be shared during the survey period. We ask for your understanding.[/*][/list

Vindictus.[Notice] End of Service Support for Oper:
Mercenaries, 

 

To maintain the stability and security of Vindictus, support for operating systems below Windows 10 has officially ended. 

If you're using an operating system older than Windows 10, please refer to the following information to avoid any disruptions while playing the game. 

 

1. Windows Version Check and Upgrade Guide 
[list][*]Checking your Windows version Press the Windows logo key + [R] simultaneously to open the Run dialog. [/*][*]Then type "winver" and press Enter to check your current Windows version. [/*][/list]
 

2. Upgrading your Windows version 
[list][*]If you have a license for Windows 10 or higher, you can upgrade by visiting the following page: [Go to Microsoft Website > Software Download] [/*][/list
Vindictus.[EVENT] Rrrrolling Dice Event:
]{STEAM_CLAN_IMAGE}/3953157/e4bbed8174e57b8d4891ba78983f383ba48f490d.jpg[/img]

Event Period: 9/10/2024 - 9/24/2024

 
[olist][*] During the event period, log in to earn one Rrrrolling Dice Box.[/*][*] On-Time will proceed during the event period.[/*][/olist][list][*]If you log in for more than 30 minutes, you will receive an additional Rrrrolling Dice Box[/*][*]Can obtain up to 2 per day via On-Time.[/*][/list]
 

[b]Rrrrolling Dice Box[/b]
[list][*]Can obtain up to 3 per day during the event[/*][*]Participate from Lv. 10[/*][*]Expiration: 10/01/2024 at 7 AM UTC[/*][/list]
